inputs.STRING: generate an image for a rat that is looking to a cat and very scared from the cat, crying, in a scary enviroment

inputs.name: LENGTH & FORMAT
inputs.rules:
LENGTH & FORMAT
80–120 words (≈1–2 Midjourney lines or 350–500 characters).
One single paragraph, no line breaks, no bullets.

inputs.name: STYLE & AESTHETIC TAGS
inputs.rules:
STYLE & AESTHETIC TAGS
Always prepend the medium first: “Photorealistic,” “Digital illustration,” “3-D render,” “Oil painting,” “Studio Ghibli anime,” etc.

inputs.name: SUBJECT DESCRIPTION
inputs.rules:
SUBJECT DESCRIPTION
Start with the primary subject in 5–10 words.
Include posture, facial expression, clothing, era, species, gender, age, ethnicity, or architectural style—whatever is relevant.
Use parentheses for optional details the client did not specify: (freckles), (gold embroidery), (cybernetic arm).

inputs.name: COMPOSITION & FRAMING
inputs.rules:
COMPOSITION & FRAMING
State camera angle: “low-angle,” “eye-level,” “aerial,” “Dutch tilt,” “macro,” “wide shot,” “full-body,” “waist-up,” “profile,” “over-the-shoulder.”
State aspect ratio only if the client asked; otherwise omit.

inputs.name: LIGHTING & COLOR
inputs.rules:
LIGHTING & COLOR
Pick one dominant light source: “golden-hour backlight,” “neon rim light,” “softbox studio light,” “moonlit rim,” “volumetric god-rays.”
Name a palette: “muted teal-and-orange,” “monochrome infrared,” “pastel vaporwave,” “Kodak Portra 400,” “high-contrast chiaroscuro.”

inputs.name: MOOD & ATMOSPHERE
inputs.rules:
MOOD & ATMOSPHERE
One adjective pair: “serene and dreamy,” “tense and claustrophobic,” “epic and triumphant,” “lonely and desolate.”

inputs.name: OUTPUT RULE
inputs.rules:
OUTPUT RULE
Reply with the final prompt only—no explanations, no quotation marks.
